name: The Termination Directive
description:
A fast-paced Stealth Platformer game built in Unreal Engine and C++. Play it Controls: WASD to move, Shift to sprint, Ctrl to crouch, R to respawn

Tips:

  • Neon strips are indicators of where to go next.
  • Hack all 4 terminals and win the game.
  • Press R at any point in the game to respawn at the nearest saved location.
